properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peace perfect peace In this dark world of sin The blood of Jesus whispers Peace within{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peace perfect peace by thronging duties pressed To do the will of Jesus This is rest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peace perfect peace With sorrows surging round On Jesus' bosom Naught but calm is found{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peace perfect peace With loved ones far away In Jesus keeping We are safe and they{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peace perfect peace Our future all unknown Jesus we know And He is on the throne{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peace perfect peace Death shadowing us and ours Jesus has vanquished Death and all its powers{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is enough Earths stuggles soon shall cease And Jesus call Us to heaven's perfect peace{/lang-eng}
